text:
e="preserve">Klaus Dede (1 June 1935 – 5 May 2018) was a German writer and journalist. He was born in Nordenham, Germany. He wrote several books over local history in northern part of Lower-Saxony (Butjadingen, Oldenburg, Bremerhaven, Stedingen, Jade, Wesermarsch) and a book about Jesus "Jesus – schwul?, Die Kirchen, die Christen und die Liebe" (translated "Was Jesus gay?"). He lives in Oldenburg.
Dede died on 5 May 2018 in Oldenburg at the age of 81.
